years_coaching: Approx. 10 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2014-15 with Utah)
accomplishments: Led Utah Jazz to multiple playoff appearances and a #1 seed (2020-21)
NBA Coach of the Year finalist
play_style: Known for a sophisticated offensive system with strong emphasis on ball movement, three-point shooting, and strong defensive principles, often utilizing versatile bigs.

years_coaching: Approx. 3 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2022-23 as interim, then permanent)
accomplishments: 2024 NBA Champion (as head coach)
Led Celtics to Eastern Conference Finals (2023)
play_style: Emphasizes a fast-paced offense, heavy three-point shooting, and aggressive, switchable defense. Focuses on player empowerment and decision-making within a structured system.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (2024-25 will be his first full season)
accomplishments: Extensive experience as a highly-regarded assistant coach with multiple NBA teams
play_style: As a first-time head coach, his full style is still emerging, but is expected to emphasize player development, strong defensive principles, and a modern, fluid offense given his background.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (2024-25 will be his first full season)
accomplishments: NBA Champion as assistant coach (Milwaukee Bucks 2021, Boston Celtics 2024)
play_style: As a first-time head coach, his full style is TBD, but given his background, likely to emphasize strong defensive foundations, player development, and a modern offensive approach focusing on spacing and ball movement.

years_coaching: Approx. 10 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2015-16 with OKC)
accomplishments: 2x NCAA National Champion (Florida Gators)
NBA Coach of the Year (2020 - co-recipient)
play_style: Focuses on player relationships and development, often adapting his offensive and defensive schemes to the strengths of his roster. Emphasizes disciplined defense and opportunistic offense, often featuring pick-and-roll action.

years_coaching: Approx. 4 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2016-17 with Brooklyn)
accomplishments: Known for player development, especially with young rosters
play_style: Emphasizes an up-tempo offense with strong ball movement, three-point shooting, and aggressive, hard-nosed defense. Known for developing young talent.

years_coaching: Approx. 7 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2013-14 with Brooklyn)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Dallas Mavericks 2022 - as head coach)
Multiple playoff appearances
play_style: Primarily focused on a strong defensive identity, aiming to limit opponent scoring. Offensively, often relies on star players and emphasizes spacing and pick-and-roll.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (2024-25 will be his first full season, served as interim previously)
accomplishments: NBA Champion as assistant coach (Denver Nuggets 2023)
play_style: As a first-time full head coach, his philosophy will build on his assistant coaching experience under Michael Malone. Expect a focus on disciplined team defense, unselfish offense, and leveraging the strengths of his star players, particularly Nikola Jokic.

years_coaching: Approx. 8 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2015-16 with Houston as interim)
accomplishments: Led Cleveland Cavaliers to playoff appearances
play_style: Known for focusing on defensive intensity and effort. Offensively, often seeks to play through big men and utilize pick-and-roll, emphasizing execution and toughness.

years_coaching: Approx. 11 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2014-15)
accomplishments: 4x NBA Champion (Golden State Warriors - as head coach)
NBA Coach of the Year (2016)
Guided Warriors to multiple NBA Finals appearances
play_style: Emphasizes ball movement, player movement, high-level passing, and three-point shooting (known as 'Strength in Numbers'). Promotes a culture of unselfishness and defensive versatility.

years_coaching: Approx. 3 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2021-22 with Boston)
accomplishments: Led Boston Celtics to NBA Finals (2022)
play_style: Known for instilling a strong defensive identity, emphasizing physicality, communication, and disciplined schemes. Offensively, he promotes ball movement and taking advantage of mismatches.

years_coaching: Approx. 23 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2001-02 with Detroit)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Dallas Mavericks 2011 - as head coach)
NBA Coach of the Year (2002)
play_style: Highly organized and strategic coach, known for complex offensive sets and in-game adjustments. Adapts his system to his personnel, often utilizing strong guard play and pick-and-roll.

years_coaching: Approx. 9 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2015-16 with Cleveland)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Cleveland Cavaliers 2016 - as head coach)
Known for his ability to coach star players and make effective in-game adjustments
play_style: Flexible and adaptable, known for his tactical adjustments during games and series. Emphasizes offensive freedom for stars while demanding strong, versatile team defense.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (2024-25 will be his first full season)
accomplishments: Highly respected former player with deep basketball IQ and strong communication skills
play_style: As a first-time head coach, his style is yet to be fully defined, but is expected to incorporate modern offensive principles (spacing, shooting, ball movement) and a focus on player development, drawing from his playing career and media insights.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (2024-25 will be his first full season)
accomplishments: Highly successful European coach (e.g., FIBA Champions League, German BBL titles)
Known for innovative offensive and defensive schemes
play_style: Coming from a European background, expected to bring a highly disciplined, systematic approach to both offense and defense, potentially with a focus on fluid ball movement and aggressive defensive rotations.

years_coaching: Approx. 17 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2008-09)
accomplishments: 3x NBA Champion (Miami Heat 2012, 2013, 2024 - as head coach)
Multiple NBA Finals appearances
One of the longest-tenured and most respected coaches in the NBA
play_style: Demands high effort, discipline, and versatility on defense. Offensively, often utilizes motion, cutting, and adaptability to personnel, with a strong emphasis on culture and player development.

years_coaching: Approx. 26 NBA seasons as head coach (started 1999-00 with Orlando)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Boston Celtics 2008 - as head coach)
NBA Coach of the Year (2000)
Extensive playoff experience and success
play_style: Known for strong defensive schemes, veteran leadership, and an emphasis on communication. Offensively, often builds around his star players while incorporating structured sets.

years_coaching: Approx. 4 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2020-21)
accomplishments: NBA All-Star Game head coach (2024)
NBA G-League Champion (2010)
play_style: Emphasizes offensive spacing and flow, often utilizing multiple bigs in unique ways. Defensively, focuses on length and disrupting opponents, though this can be a work in progress at times.

years_coaching: Approx. 4 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2021-22)
accomplishments: Led Pelicans to playoff contention and play-in success
play_style: Focuses on developing a strong team culture, defensive intensity, and a free-flowing offense that leverages his players' strengths, particularly in transition and pick-and-roll situations.

years_coaching: 13 NBA seasons as head coach (with Lakers, Cavaliers, and Kings)
accomplishments: NBA Coach of the Year (2009, 2023)
Led Sacramento Kings to playoff berth after long drought
NBA Champion (as assistant coach with Spurs, Warriors)
play_style: Known for his strong emphasis on defense, toughness, and accountability. Offensively, he typically runs structured sets designed to maximize efficiency and player strengths, often involving good ball movement.

years_coaching: Approx. 5 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2020-21)
accomplishments: NBA Coach of the Year (2024)
Led young Thunder team to top of Western Conference
play_style: Innovating and analytical, emphasizes versatility, spacing, and high basketball IQ. Promotes a positionless style of play with aggressive defense, frequent switching, and a modern, high-volume three-point offense.

years_coaching: Approx. 4 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2021-22)
accomplishments: Guided young Magic team to significant improvement and playoff contention
play_style: Focuses on player development, defensive improvement, and building a strong team identity. Offensively, emphasizes ball movement, spacing, and capitalizing on athletic advantages, often through drives and cuts.

years_coaching: Approx. 7 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2018-19 with Toronto)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Toronto Raptors 2019 - as head coach)
NBA Coach of the Year (2020)
play_style: Highly innovative and adaptable, known for his aggressive and unconventional defensive schemes (e.g., box-and-one, zone variations). Offensively, he prioritizes spacing, ball movement, and creative playmaking.

years_coaching: Approx. 12 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2013-14 with Atlanta)
accomplishments: NBA Champion (Milwaukee Bucks 2021 - as head coach)
2x NBA Coach of the Year (2015, 2019)
Led teams to multiple deep playoff runs
play_style: Emphasizes a strong defensive foundation with an aggressive, switching scheme. Offensively, focuses on spacing, three-point shooting, and free-flowing ball movement, often utilizing a pick-and-roll heavy attack.

years_coaching: Approx. 4 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2021-22)
accomplishments: NBA Champion as a player (Detroit Pistons 2004)
Developing young talent in a rebuilding phase
play_style: Focuses on building a tough, defensive-minded team, drawing from his playing experience. Offensively, aims for disciplined execution and creating opportunities through good ball movement.

years_coaching: Approx. 13 NBA seasons as head coach (various stints since 2005-06)

Led Sacramento Kings to end long playoff drought

years_coaching: Approx. 29 NBA seasons as head coach (started 1996-97)
accomplishments: 5x NBA Champion (San Antonio Spurs - as head coach)
3x NBA Coach of the Year (2003, 2012, 2014)
Winningest coach in NBA history
Olympic Gold Medal (Team USA Men's Basketball)
play_style: Highly adaptable, emphasizing fundamental basketball, unselfish play, ball movement, and strong team defense. Known for his direct communication, demanding nature, and ability to develop players and systems.

years_coaching: Approx. 2 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2023-24)
accomplishments: Extensive experience as an assistant coach and G-League head coach (G-League Champion)
play_style: Known for an emphasis on offensive flow, ball movement, and making quick decisions. Focuses on player development and fostering a positive team environment, drawing from his international coaching background.

years_coaching: Approx. 3 NBA seasons as head coach (started 2022-23)
accomplishments: Quickly established a competitive team despite rebuilding
play_style: Emphasizes an unselfish, free-flowing offense with good spacing and ball movement. Defensively, he promotes disciplined schemes, versatility, and high effort. Known for strong communication and player relationships.

years_coaching: 1 NBA season as head coach (took over interim 2023-24, named permanent for 2024-25)
accomplishments: Known for defensive expertise and player development as an assistant coach
play_style: As a new full-time head coach, his style is still solidifying, but is expected to prioritize disciplined defense, fundamental play, and maximizing the potential of young talent, given his background.
